name: TrackChain
long_description:
TrackChain is all-in-one AI-Powered Freight Management Platform for US-MEX region, designed to automate and transform the entire transportation process from booking to payment. It provides advanced solutions for carrier procurement, automated load assignment, real-time shipment tracking, freight audit & payments, and transportation analytics.

Our Platform makes this complete workflow streamlined through an intuitive interface, API integrations, and painless onboarding, has reduced the time our customers spend on freight tasks by 80%, or 30+ hours per week, freeing up teams for more strategic work. TrackChain has also cut customersâ€™ freight spending costs by 30%, which can translate to millions of dollars per year.

TrackChain is now a fast-growing platform that already manages nearly 240k loads annually. Many of our early customers are mining, construction, automotive, steel, and manufacturing firms.
one_liner: All-in-one AI-Powered Freight Management Platform for US-MEX region
